solvers.name: simpleFoam
solvers.description: Steady-state solver for incompressible, turbulent flows using the SIMPLE algorithm

solvers.name: pimpleFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible flow using the PIMPLE (merged PISO-SIMPLE) algorithm

solvers.name: pisoFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible flow using the PISO algorithm

solvers.name: interFoam
solvers.description: Solver for two incompressible, isothermal immiscible fluids using a VOF phase-fraction method

solvers.name: interIsoFoam
solvers.description: Solver for two incompressible, isothermal immiscible fluids using isoAdvector phase-fraction method

solvers.name: multiphaseInterFoam
solvers.description: Solver for n incompressible, isothermal immiscible fluids using VOF

solvers.name: compressibleInterFoam
solvers.description: Solver for 2 compressible, isothermal immiscible fluids using VOF

solvers.name: rhoPimpleFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for compressible flow using the PIMPLE algorithm

solvers.name: rhoSimpleFoam
solvers.description: Steady-state solver for compressible turbulent flow using the SIMPLE algorithm

solvers.name: sonicFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for compressible flows with shock waves

solvers.name: rhoCentralFoam
solvers.description: Density-based compressible flow solver using central-upwind schemes

solvers.name: buoyantSimpleFoam
solvers.description: Steady-state solver for buoyant, turbulent flow of compressible fluids

solvers.name: buoyantPimpleFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for buoyant, turbulent flow of compressible fluids

solvers.name: reactingFoam
solvers.description: Solver for combustion with chemical reactions

solvers.name: coldEngineFoam
solvers.description: Solver for cold flow in internal combustion engines with mesh motion

solvers.name: engineFoam
solvers.description: Solver for internal combustion engines with spray, combustion and heat transfer

solvers.name: sprayFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for compressible flow with spray parcels

solvers.name: coalChemistryFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for coal combustion with solid particles

solvers.name: DPMFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible flow with Discrete Particle Method (Lagrangian particles)

solvers.name: MPPICFoam
solvers.description: Solver for incompressible flow with Multi-Phase Particle-In-Cell dense particles

solvers.name: reactingParcelFoam
solvers.description: Solver for compressible flow with reacting Lagrangian particles

solvers.name: twoPhaseEulerFoam
solvers.description: Solver for a system of 2 incompressible fluid phases with heat transfer

solvers.name: multiphaseEulerFoam
solvers.description: Solver for multiple incompressible fluid phases with heat and mass transfer

solvers.name: driftFluxFoam
solvers.description: Solver for 2 incompressible fluid phases using mixture model

solvers.name: potentialFoam
solvers.description: Potential flow solver for incompressible, inviscid flow

solvers.name: icoFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible, laminar flow of Newtonian fluids

solvers.name: nonNewtonianIcoFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible, laminar flow of non-Newtonian fluids

solvers.name: SRFPimpleFoam

solvers.description: Steady-state solver for incompressible flow with Multiple Reference Frames

solvers.name: MRFPimpleFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible flow with Multiple Reference Frames

solvers.name: pimpleDyMFoam
solvers.description: Transient solver for incompressible flow with dynamic mesh motion

solvers.name: laplacianFoam
solvers.description: Solver for simple Laplace equation (e.g., thermal diffusion)

solvers.name: scalarTransportFoam
solvers.description: Solves a transport equation for a passive scalar

solvers.description: Direct Numerical Simulation (DNS) solver for incompressible flow

solvers.name: shallowWaterFoam

solvers.description: Solver for electrostatics

solvers.description: Solver for solid mechanics (linear elasticity)

solvers.name: thermoFoam

solvers.description: Solver for conjugate heat transfer between solid and fluid regions
